section.title: dss_drpc_handler Struct Reference
Detailed Description
section.para: Any dss_module that accepts dRPC communications over the Unix Domain Socket must provide one or more dRPC handler functions. The handler is used by the I/O server to multiplex incoming dRPC messages for processing.
The dRPC messaging module ID is different from the dss_module's ID. A dss_module may handle more than one dRPC module ID.
Definition at line 233 of file daos_engine.h.
